title: Narrative Structure Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of narrative structural elements in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each narrative structure level (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

storyline.description: The overarching narrative arc spanning multiple volumes
storyline.example: The Shadow Team Chronicles: Rise of Neo-Tokyo

volume.description: Major section of a storyline with particular phase or theme

act.description: Significant narrative shift or thematic change within a volume

story.description: Contained plot arc within an act

chapter.description: Major event-based division within a story

part.description: Smallest unit of narrative, corresponding to a single AI response
